sourcesContent:
Nom{{ user.name }}
Prénom{{ user.lastName }}
Email{{ user.email }}
Téléphone{{ user.phone}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user/modele/user'; import { UserService } from '../user/service/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-compte-user', templateUrl: './compte-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./compte-user.component.scss'] }) export class CompteUserComponent implements OnInit{ user: User = { name: "", lastName: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "" }; constructor(private userService: UserService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getUserInfo(); } getUserInfo():void{ this.userService.getUserInfo().subscribe( (data) => { this.user = data; }, (error) => { console.error("Erreur fetching user info"); } ); } }
